verses.name: John 14:6
verses.text: Jesus saith unto him, I am the way, the truth, and the life: no man cometh unto the Father, but by me.

verses.name: John 14:7
verses.text: If ye had known me, ye should have known my Father also: and from henceforth ye know him, and have seen him.

verses.name: John 14:8
verses.text: Philip saith unto him, Lord, shew us the Father, and it sufficeth us.

verses.name: John 14:9
verses.text: Jesus saith unto him, Have I been so long time with you, and yet hast thou not known me, Philip? he that hath seen me hath seen the Father; and how sayest thou then, Shew us the Father?
